name: FNF - Vs. Clip Full Week
description:
BF and GF run into with a guy guarding a door named Clip, with his ever so beloved Hazel, and they seem to know who you are...

Contents:

  • A brand new week (3 new songs) Complete with cutscenes, animated portraits, 2 endings, and a brand new game mechanic! (instructions on how to play are shown below!)
  • That's pretty much it!

Combat instructions: 
Occasionally throughout songs, GF will pull out Tricky's stop sign (how did she get that?!) and when she does,

Press the SPACEBAR 3 times very quickly. Successfully pulling it off will give you a boost in health and points!
